actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution condemning the government of Chile for the death of Rodrigo Rojas de Negri and commending United States Ambassador to Chile Harry G. Barnes for attempting to gain proper medical attention for the youth and for representing the United States at the funeral of Rodrigo Rojas de Negri.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives commends Ambassador Harry Barnes for attending the funeral of Rodrigo Rojas De Negri and for his efforts to obtain medical care for the youth. Holds the Government of Chile responsible for his injuries and denial of proper medical care. Condemns the Government of Chile for Rodrigo Rojas' death.

titles.title: A resolution condemning the government of Chile for the death of Rodrigo Rojas de Negri and commending United States Ambassador to Chile Harry G. Barnes for attempting to gain proper medical attention for the youth and for representing the United States at the funeral of Rodrigo Rojas de Negri.
